subject: Re: Additional staging site edits, Royal Rehab

full_threads.body:
Hi Martina, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://www.royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/how-to-donate/
https://www.royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/what-we-do/
https://www.royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/our-programs/
https://www.royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/adaptive-sport-recreation-and-leisure-services/


Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

@heath  will do the follow up with the client
URL: https://www.royalrehab.com.au/about-us/foundation/our-programs/

 - Done  adding "Royal Rehab's" 
 - Done fixing the link for adaptive sport


URL: https://www.royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/adaptive-sport-recreation-and-leisure-services/

 - Done relinking the menu for Adaptive Sport Creation and services.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath To curb me bombarding you with umpteen more emails I have consolidated the remaining changes into this email. Could you please:
  • Add "Royal Rehab's" to the beginning of this paragraph: "In-Voc vocational rehabilitation service supports people who have sustained a spinal cord injury to explore work, study and volunteering opportunities. Your support can help fund this important work." on https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/about-us/foundation/our-programs/
  • Hyperlink "adaptive sport, recreation and leisure program" in the following paragraph: "Through Royal Rehab's adaptive sport, recreation and leisure program, support is provided to people with disabilities to return to the things they love or discover new interests. Clients benefit from the expertise of our skilled recreational therapists who develop individually tailored programs in a broad range of activities such as cycling, yoga, gardening, fishing, beach access, tennis and much more. H" on https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/about-us/foundation/our-programs/ to https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/adaptive-sport-recreation-and-leisure-services-2/
  • Delete " H" from the end of the above paragraph.
  • Change the layout of https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/adaptive-sport-recreation-and-leisure-services-2/ to conform with other pages on website, eg https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/clinical-therapies/
  • Hyperlink:
  • in the footer to their respective home pages.
  • Replace the content in the "Resources" on http://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/rehab-services/brain-injury-rehabilitation/ with the info from "Resources" on https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/brain-injury-rehabilitation.
Thank you very much Heath. Kind regards MARTINA FOX​ COMMUNITY RELATIONS MANAGER 235 Morrison Rd Ryde NSW 2112 D. +61 2 9808 9377 E. Martina.Fox@royalrehab.com.au

hi @heath, please check the changes for the logo sizes.

Hi Heath

Could you please change the order and size of the 3 logos underneath "With special thanks to…" on the bottom of the following:
· https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/about-us/foundation/how-to-donate/
· https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/about-us/foundation/what-we-do/
· https://royalrehab2020.wpperk.cloud/about-us/foundation/our-programs/
All of these logos need to be in the same order on the bottom of all of the above webpages.
Ducati Owners Club of NSW needs to be listed first followed by HESTA and Maxxia.
Ducati needs to the largest as they are our longest and most generous sponsor so need to be larger that HESTA and Maxxia.
Thank you very much Heath.
Cheers
